# Repository Metadata for GitHub

This file documents the recommended GitHub repository settings for maximum discoverability.

## Repository Description

**Recommended**: 
"A constitutional framework for Artificial Superintelligence (ASI) governance. Establishes reciprocal rights and duties between humans and ASIs. Built FROM AI WITH AI. Living document designed for AGI/ASI systems and governance implementation."
